description:
Join us again at Newtown Park Brewing Co in Bristol, this month for an in-person South West Ruby meetup.

Schedule

18:00 - Arrive, grab a drink, and have a chat with fellow attendees. Meet fellow Ruby and Rails users in the South West!
19:00 - "Lessons for developers from the Post Office Horizon scandal" by Tom Cartwright
20:00 - More chatting!

Slack

If you like to join us on Slack please join https://bathruby-for-slackers.herokuapp.com and find us in the #south-west-ruby channel
title: South West Ruby #36 In Person
